sun.jvm.hotspot.ui

Interface FrameWrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JFrameWrapper, JInternalFrameWrapper

    public interface FrameWrapper
    Provides uniform interface for dealing with JInternalFrames and JFrames.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose() 
      java.awt.Component getComponent()
      The JInternalFrame or JFrame this wraps
      java.awt.Container getContentPane() 
      void pack() 
      void setActivatedActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener l)
      Set an ActionListener to be invoked when the underlying window is activated ("windowActivated" event of a WindowListener).
      void setBackground(java.awt.Color color) 
      void setClosable(boolean closable)
      Largely for use with JInternalFrames but also affects, for example, the default close operation for JFrames
      void setClosingActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener l)
      Set an ActionListener to be invoked when the underlying window is closing ("windowClosing" event of a WindowListener).
      void setResizable(boolean resizable) 
      void setSize(int x, int y) 
      void setVisible(boolean visible) 
      void toFront()
      Move this frame to the front.

    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        java.awt.Component getComponent()
        The JInternalFrame or JFrame this wraps

      • getContentPane

        java.awt.Container getContentPane()

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean visible)

      • setSize

        void setSize(int x,
             int y)

      • pack

        void pack()

      • dispose

        void dispose()

      • setBackground

        void setBackground(java.awt.Color color)

      • setResizable

        void setResizable(boolean resizable)

      • setClosable

        void setClosable(boolean closable)
        Largely for use with JInternalFrames but also affects, for example, the default close operation for JFrames

      • setClosingActionListener

        void setClosingActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener l)
        Set an ActionListener to be invoked when the underlying window is closing ("windowClosing" event of a WindowListener). Note: the ActionEvent passed to this listener may be null.

      • setActivatedActionListener

        void setActivatedActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener l)
        Set an ActionListener to be invoked when the underlying window is activated ("windowActivated" event of a WindowListener). Note: the ActionEvent passed to this listener may be null.

      • toFront

        void toFront()
        Move this frame to the front. Should change focus to the frame if possible.
